statements: SELECT * FROM forecast_predictions;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_date, weather_condition, temperature FROM forecast_predictions;
SELECT prediction_id, weather_condition, temperature, prediction_date FROM forecast_predictions;
SELECT * FROM forecast_predictions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT prediction_date, weather_condition FROM forecast_predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_date, weather_condition, temperature FROM forecast_predictions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM forecast_predictions WHERE weather_condition IN ('Sunny', 'Cloudy') ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM forecast_predictions WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy';
SELECT prediction_date, COUNT(*) AS count_predictions FROM forecast_predictions GROUP BY prediction_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY count_predictions DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, weather_condition, temperature FROM forecast_predictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC,prediction_date ASC;
SELECT id, prediction, temperature FROM forecasting;
SELECT prediction, temperature, id FROM forecasting;
SELECT temperature, prediction, id FROM forecasting;
SELECT location, timestamp, temperature FROM weather_data;
SELECT timestamp, location, temperature FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM forecasting WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND temperature < 20
SELECT prediction FROM forecasting WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT forecast, confidence_level FROM forecast_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT updated_forecast, update_time FROM prediction_updates ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT date, forecast, confidence_level FROM forecast_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT updated_forecast, update_time FROM prediction_updates WHERE update_time >= '2022-01-15 00:00:00' ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT w.date, w.temperature, f.forecast FROM weather_data w JOIN forecast_data f ON w.date = f.date WHERE w.temperature < 20 AND f.confidence_level > 0.5 ORDER BY w.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast;
SELECT temperature, humidity, weather_conditions FROM RealTimeWeatherData WHERE location='New York';
SELECT forecast_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, humidity, weather_conditions FROM WeatherForecast WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM ForecastLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT forecast_id, weather_conditions FROM WeatherForecast WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeWeatherData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, timestamp, notes FROM ForecastLogs WHERE forecast_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT updated_table, action_performed FROM UpdateHistory WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT forecast, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data ORDER BY forecast DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM forecast_predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_date;
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM historical_weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed, forecast FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM forecast_predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(wind_speed), COUNT(*) FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, prediction_date, actual_temperature, actual_humidity, error_margin FROM forecast_accuracy WHERE error_margin <= 2 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM weather_data_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
